sources.title: The Black Panther (1977) True Crime Infamy: The Case That Shocked A Nation! 4K
sources.description:
A gung-ho ex-military man pursues a secret life of crime

Director: Ian Merrick
Writers: Michael Armstrong, Joanne Leighton

Main cast:
Donald Sumpter – Donald Neilson
Debbie Farrington – Lesley Whittle
Marjorie Yates – Neilson's Wife
Sylvia O'Donnell – Neilson's Daughter
Andrew Burt – Lesley's Brother
Alison Key – Lesley's Sister-in-Law
Ruth Dunning – Lesley's Mother
David Swift – Detective Chief Superintendent

Genres: Crime, Thriller, Drama
Release date: December 26, 1977 
Filming location: Dudley, England, UK


https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL2gsu7VGzgdbtxZGahjOpER2huEhTG9Rb

@CultCinemaClassics

metadata.Plot: A gung-ho ex-military man pursues a secret life of crime, culminating in the kidnapping of a teenage heiress.
metadata.Actors: Donald Sumpter, Debbie Farrington, Marjorie Yates
